H0.text: Which great composer's only ballets were, 'The Creatures Of Prometheus' and 'Ritterballet'. Mozart

H1.text: Which great composer's only ballets were, 'The Creatures Of Prometheus' and 'Ritterballet'. Tchaikovsky

H2.text: Which great composer's only ballets were, 'The Creatures Of Prometheus' and 'Ritterballet'. Gluck

H3.text: Which great composer's only ballets were, 'The Creatures Of Prometheus' and 'Ritterballet'. Betoven

A4.text: Beethoven completed a ballet, The Creatures of Prometheus (op. 43).

A5.text: Waldstein commissioned Beethoven's first work for the stage, the ballet Musik zu einem Ritterballett (WoO 1).
